title: The Story of Prophet Adam (AS) - Short Series
description: The first human created by Allah, father of mankind.

title: The Story of Prophet Idris (Enoch) (AS) - Short Series
description: A revered prophet, known as Idris in Islam, who lived after Adam and before Nuh, recognized for his piety, knowledge, and ascension to the heavens.

title: The Story of Prophet Nuh (Noah) (AS) - Short Series
description: A prophet known for calling his people to monotheism for centuries and for building the Ark to save believers and pairs of all creatures from the Great Flood.

title: The Story of Prophet Hud (AS) - Short Series
description: The story of Prophet Hud (AS) who was sent to the people of 'Ad to call them to the worship of Allah alone. They were a powerful, wealthy, and arrogant people who refused his message, and were subsequently destroyed by a furious wind.
